content.rendered:
On the 8th of February 2017, PT Motor Varese Indonesia (or MVI) introduced themselves to the Indonesian public as the sole agent and distributor for one of the world’s hottest new motorcycles at the moment, the MV Agusta Brutale 800.

In a ceremony hosted at The Pallas, Fairground SCBD, the event started and opened at 7 PM in the evening by the MC before PT MVI’s chairman, Mr. William Tarjanto gave a welcoming speech and provided the enthusiastic crowd with a brief history of MV and its crown jewel, the Brutale 800.

Soon after, the star of the show entered the arena to give the audience a closer look and marvel at this apex of motorcycle engineering.

It is an absolute masterpiece. The design is exotic, yet modern. The feel is muscular, yet gentle. The elliptical shape from its main headlamp that is now a full LED, gave the Brutale 800 a very simplistically stylish aura, that emanates from every part of the bike.

The three-pipe exhaust gave the Brutale 800 a touch of the steampunk elemental tone to the general look of the bike, while the saddle chassis was made out of a special blend of light alloy, and perfectly integrated into the air box and the 16,5 litre trapezoidal fuel tank to complete the overall style of this magnificent motorcycle.

Engine-wise, the in-line 3-cylinder engine with rotating crankshaft slightly lowered its ferociousness from the previous model’s 125 hp to 116 hp, to meet Euro 4 emission regulations, with a maximum torque of 83 Nm at 7600 rpm.

Therefore, to summarize this motorcycle in a few words, it is incredibly sexy and on top of that, as its name ‘Brutale’ suggests, incredibly brutal.
